tweet: Thanks for sharing!

My thanks to @Lin_Manuel for your ongoing work to inspire and represent Puerto Rico. You are always finding ways to give back. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/12/26/theater/hamilton-puerto-rico-lin-manuel-miranda.html …
Wishing a happy Kwanzaa to all who celebrate! Best wishes for a joyous celebration!

Heartbroken to hear of a second child's death in CBP custody. We must demand accountability, find answers and put an end to this Administration's hateful, dangerous anti-immigrant policies.
 https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/us-says-8-year-old-guatemalan-boy-has-died-in-custody/2018/12/25/25145750-0872-11e9-8942-0ef442e59094_story.html?noredirect=on&utm_term=.8449ad7e7feb …
Wishing all a Merry Christmas and best wishes for a joyous and peaceful New Year!

It is appalling that @POTUS & Congressional Republicans would shut down the government days before Christmas because they didn’t get what they wanted. I urge the GOP to embrace compromise and reopen government. #TrumpShutdown

.@RealDonaldTrump says he is “proud” to shut down the government for his costly, expensive border wall, yet his government shutdown leaves 90% of @DHSgov employees to work without pay just days before Christmas. #TrumpShutdown
The majority of Americans don’t think a #TrumpShutdown is good policy. @HouseGOP & @RealDonaldTrump ought to work with Democrats to reopen the government now.
Cruise ships docking using clean power 50% of the time  is not acceptable, and CM Menchaca and I are calling on EDC to get to  100%. Anything short is inadequate.
The #TrumpShutdown has many negative effects for workers and families. It also illustrates yet another reason why a federal receivership of NYCHA would be a bad idea!

TO ALL RED HOOK RESIDENTS – We hear you on the cruise ship issue. We’ve gotten 50% of cruise ships to dock using clean power, up from 33% - but make no mistake, 100% is the goal. We’ll be working closely with EDC to ensure this happens. Anything short of 100% is inadequate.
I'm pleased that SCOTUS has rejected @realDonaldTrump's stay request in asylum case.  We must continue to oppose this coldhearted and hateful policy.

Trump’s immoral, expensive & ineffective border wall faces bipartisan opposition from Democrats & many Republicans. There’s no excuse for letting it lead to another #TrumpShutdown! pic.twitter.com/xOgANe6J58
More than half of Americans say increasing funding for Trump’s border wall isn’t worth a #TrumpShutdown. @realDonaldTrump needs to give up & let Congress keep government open! #NoBorderWall
Praying for a swift recovery for Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg.
Remember, the Senate UNANIMOUSLY approved a deal that would avoid all this and keep government running until February. It was @realDonaldTrump's decision to reject that bipartisan agreement.

Sorry @realdonaldtrump. As you said on 12/11 "I will take the mantle. I will be the one to shut it down." 

This will be the #TrumpTantrumShutDown. 

Please reconsider. 

There's too much at stake. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1076132028888825857 …

Everyone should read Def Sec Mattis' letter to @realDonaldTrump. Makes clear his view of this Administration's irresponsible foreign policy. And, it comes as the President is threatening a Gov't shut down.  @GOP isn't  governing. Thankfully Dems will have a House Majority in Jan.

The latest @GOP bill is a nonstarter & it has NO chance of enactment. Not only, does this bill fund @realDonaldTrump's stupid, offensive border wall, but it fails to provide nutritional assistance for Puerto Rico. I'm voting NO!  Let's stop wasting time & work to keep gov't open!
Thank you!
Thank you to  @latinomuseum for providing me with the Legacy Award! I fully support your call for a #LatinoMuseum! pic.twitter.com/XiIYlhbhvv
Honored to receive it! Thank you for your good work!
I'll continue fighting for relief for Puerto Rico's debt -- and also oppose measures that would harm working people and those who are already suffering.

The @washingtonpost has published an op-ed by Puerto Rico's Oversight Board that amounts to nothing more than a disingenuous defense of fiscal austerity. The argument "we have to cut benefits and make things harder on working families to create jobs" has long been debunked.
The people of Puerto Rico need to know these consultants are working for the good of the Island - not lining their pockets!

Under the current rules, consultants working on Puerto Rico's debt can hold bonds issued by the Commonwealth - and not even disclose this potential conflict of interest. I've introduced legislation to bring transparency to the process. https://nyti.ms/2LtcX2B

Today I joined @RogerMarshallMD in introducing bipartisan legislation to stop predatory small business loans based on "confessions of judgment", which deprive small business owners of their rights. This  practice must be stopped!  https://bit.ly/2Gtm8Be  https://bloom.bg/2BlPnBy

Carefully monitoring the situation in #Chinatown and thinking of those injured by this tragic fire. My thanks to @FDNY & the brave first responders who were on the scene to assist. https://www.nbcnewyork.com/news/local/2-Seriously-Hurt-After-Fire-Breaks-Out-at-Chinatown-Building-FDNY-Says-503149721.html …
2/2 Next year, House Democrats will do better, working to actually pass appropriations bill and do the work the American people elected us to - not govern by crisis. We owe the American people more!

1/2 It's unfortunate that this White House and GOP Cong leadership lurch from crisis to crisis, periodically threatening to shut down our govt. I am pleased that we are approaching a deal that would keep the government open AND it will NOT fund a "wall".

Acts of hate are on the rise in our nation. That's why I'm pushing legislation dedicating additional federal resources to track, prevent and prosecute hate crimes. This video, in particular, shows one of our children being targeted. Simply unconscionable. https://twitter.com/MuslimIQ/status/1074870291678068736 …

Pleased that my friend @DavilaAssembly has been appointed the Chair of the NYS Assembly & Senate Puerto Rican/Hispanic Task Force.  

Maritza has been a steadfast, tireless champion for our community and I know she will continue her great work in this new role!

I am pleased to see bump stocks taken out of commerce, but this small a step so long, after so many tragedies, simply is not enough. 

In the new Congress, my colleagues and I will continue fighting for strong, tangible steps to combat the scourge of gun violence.

.@GOP is continuing a relentless assault on Americans' healthcare. Whether it's preexisting conditions or those newly eligible for Medicaid this Republican court case puts healthcare at risk for millions. We must fight this ruling in Congress & the Courts! https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1073758811318575104 …

It becomes chillingly clearer every single day how relentless Russia was in attempting to influence our elections & assist @realdonaldtrump. This is why I called for a Special Counsel in December 2016 - and why Mueller's investigation must be protected! https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2018/12/16/new-report-russian-disinformation-prepared-senate-shows-operations-scale-sweep/?tid=ss_tw&utm_term=.f12d111547bc …

Let’s be clear, Secretary DeVos fought to strip protections for defrauded students. It took a federal judge to block DeVos’ efforts. Student debt is crippling an entire generation of young people. It is time to get serious about providing solutions. https://politi.co/2CfVPuc

Tucker Carlson's rabid, anti-immigrant comments are an assault on decency & repugnant even by Fox News standards. He must be condemned. By the way, Tucker, as a NYer and top Dem on the @HouseSBCDems I've seen countless ways immigrants enhance our economy.  https://bit.ly/2QAS4Zd

One year ago, the FCC repealed #NetNeutrality rules and I joined millions of Americans in fighting for the free and open internet. Time is running out - we must keep up the fight for #NetNeutrality starting with the CRA discharge petition to force a vote on the House Floor! pic.twitter.com/ngrUs9dISx

As we observe and remember the six-year, tragic anniversary of Sandy Hook, we must reaffirm our commitment to meaningful gun control reform.  #Enough https://twitter.com/Everytown/status/1073573586802274304 …

This is morally unconscionable. A child has died in the custody of our government. We need answers from CBP as to how this happened -- and we need accountability.  America must be better than this. https://wapo.st/2GhITrT?tid=ss_tw&utm_term=.28300d0546c7 …

I was sickened and saddened by this behavior which has no place in our nation, our society or our great city. 

My thanks to those who worked to defuse this situation and to the @NYPDnews for arresting the perpetrator. https://twitter.com/PlatanoMan/status/1072976516596813826 …

Today Firefighter Faizal Coto of Engine Company 245, was laid to rest.  I extend my sincere condolences to his parents, siblings, friends and Brotherhood within the @FDNY.   https://brooklynreporter.com/2018/12/wake-held-for-firefighter-beaten-to-death-on-belt-parkway/ … pic.twitter.com/AIg65HXMMx
At world’s biggest climate conference @COP24, @realDonaldTrump appallingly promoted fossil fuels. Democrats will continue to reverse #ClimateChange, not promote it! #GreenNewDeal #ActOnClimate

One year ago, the FCC repealed #NetNeutrality rules. This decision threatens free speech, innovation, and economic opportunity. We can still restore #NetNeutrality, but we must build momentum on the CRA discharge petition!

One year ago, the FCC repealed #NetNeutrality rules and I joined millions of Americans in fighting for the free and open internet. Time is running out - we must keep up the fight for #NetNeutrality starting with the CRA discharge petition to force a vote on the House Floor!

The U.S. government has helped fuel a humanitarian crisis in Yemen causing the deaths of thousand of innocents yet the @HouseGOP is blocking debate. This is unconscionable & one reason I voted no on Farm Bill rule. I'll keep pushing for change on this! https://twitter.com/jamiedupree/status/1072697458243833858 …

I hope and pray for a speedy recovery to the devoted community member Jenny Low. We are all waiting for you to come home!

The holidays are a good time to see old friends. Delighted @RepSteveChabot  the top Republican on the Small Business Committee came by my office today with holiday candy!  Washington can be partisan, but we do have our friendships across the aisle! pic.twitter.com/xPo0SPh1G3

Signing up for health coverage is much cheaper than you might think. Most people qualify for financial help and 8 in 10 people can get covered for less than $75 per month. Head over & start searching for an affordable plan for 2019. #GetCovered  https://www.healthcare.gov/

The last major #GOPShutdown in 2013 cost the American economy 120,000 jobs and $24 billion. Republicans need to recognize they lost election & stop trying to hold the nation hostage to their radical demands.

My heart broke when I learned that two little girls were the victims of this weekend’s deadly fire in Bushwick. My prayers are with their family and everyone else affected by this tragedy. Thank you to our first responders. I urge a swift investigation into the fire’s cause. https://twitter.com/NY1/status/1071801101802979328 …

None of us can rest when any part of our community is harassed or discriminated against simply because of who they are. I stand in solidarity with all people. Human Rights are everybody’s rights. #HumanRightsDay #StandUp4HumanRights

Over a year after Hurricane Maria, challenges continue to plague Puerto Rico. I have joined my colleagues calling on the @FOMBPR to refocus their mission on rebuilding Puerto Rico and nurturing Puerto Rico’s economic recovery. #PuertoRicoSeLevanta  https://bit.ly/2QMQD9i

Access to women’s health care is not up for debate and it’s not just a “women’s issue”—it’s a basic human right.  Glad the Supreme Court has rejected appeals by states aiming to defund @PPFA . https://bit.ly/2SFKCbY

Reversing the catastrophic consequences of climate change is one of the most defining moral issues of our time. 

Without drastic action, our natural disasters will worsen and our cities will become unrecognizable. Let’s get to work. #GreenNewDeal

Come January, we will see a record number of women, people of color and LGBTQ members of the House. 

This means a Congress that better reflects the diversity of America. I can’t wait to join these new members as we get to work #ForThePeople.

Tear gas is a chemical weapon and it was used against innocent children and families by the U.S. government at the border. Greenhouse gas emissions worldwide continue rising.

According to the @GlobalCarbonProject, carbon emissions are expected to increase by 2.7% in 2018.  We need action today -- not tomorrow. 

This will be the challenge of a political generation! #GreenNewDeal

There are just a few days left to restore #NetNeutrality, and the clock is ticking! Every Member of Congress should side with their constituents - not big telecom companies - and support the CRA discharge petition.

Proud to join @Ocasio2018 & @sunrisemvmt in calling for a #GreenNewDeal & a Congressional Climate Commission. We cannot delay when it comes to addressing this existential threat to our planet. Water-adjacent cities, especially like New York, cannot stand by as sea levels rise!

It was my honor this morning to mark the dedication of the Mabel Lee Memorial Post Office. Dr. Lee was a pioneering figure whose life changing work is very much felt today here in Chinatown. Thank you to First Chinese Baptist Church for hosting this wonderful celebration. pic.twitter.com/ZgaoPx4YQ9

Happening today! 🔽

Hope to see you there! https://twitter.com/NydiaVelazquez/status/1068610235965849600 …

TOMORROW: Join me as we honor the remarkable legacy of Chinatown luminary Dr. Mabel Lee by dedicating the post office at 6 Doyers Street in Dr. Lee’s memory. 

Event will start at 11AM at First Chinese Baptist Church (21 Pell St.). Look forward to seeing you there!

To all my friends and neighbors observing Hanukkah, I wish you a joyous celebration and Festival of Lights! 

Chag Sameach!

Our nation has lost a true patriot, statesman and steadfast public servant with the passing of George H. W. Bush. I am thinking of his entire family and all who knew and loved him.

In the United States, communities of color are disproportionately impacted by HIV. This #WorldAIDSDay, let’s recommit to fighting stigma and expanding access to high-quality care and comprehensive sex education. To help #EndAIDS, please get tested and #KnowYourStatus.
